item.description:
The Music Hall has scheduled another performance for Greg Mortensen. The original sold out very quickly, don't miss your chance this time.

Writers on a New England Stage: Greg Mortenson

The Music Hall and NH Public Radio present: The author of Three Cups of Tea, the #1 New York Times bestseller published in 29 countries, Greg Mortenson will discuss his work in Afghanistan and his new book, Stones into School. This dramatic first person narrative picks up where Three Cups of Tea left off in 2003, recounting his relentless ongoing efforts to establish schools for girls in Afghanistan.

To secure a book signed on the night, purchase a voucher in advance through the Box Office or RiverRun Bookstore.


“Mortenson’s premise that books, not bombs, are the best weapons against extremist groups and that the real enemy is ignorance, which breeds hatred, is a new light of hope in a place of turmoil."
— CNN

TICKETS:
$13 ($11 Members)

Tickets on sale to members Saturday Oct 31.
Tickets on sale to the public Saturday Nov 7.

For tickets go to the Music Hall Website
